entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning early this morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 5.
